Package mystars.controllers

Class CourseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mystars.controllers.CourseController
  • public class CourseController
extends java.lang.Object
    This courseController class manages the creation of course, course index and lesson. It also manages the registration of course, dropping of course and swopping of index.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      CourseController()

      • start

        public void start()
        Initializes the course controller object.

      • createCourse

        public void createCourse​(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String courseCode,
                         School school,
                         int au)
                  throws AppException
        Creates a new course.
        Parameters:
        name - The course's name.
        courseCode - The course's code.
        school - The course's school.
        au - The number of AUs this course is worth.
        Throws:
        AppException - if another course identified by courseCode already exists
        AppException - if invalid parameters are passed to the constructor of Course

      • createIndex

        public void createIndex​(java.lang.String courseCode,
                        int indexNo,
                        int maxEnrolled)
                 throws AppException
        Creates a new index for the course identified by courseCode.
        Parameters:
        courseCode - Identifier of Course
        indexNo - Index number of the new index
        maxEnrolled - The maximum number of students enrolled in the new index
        Throws:
        AppException - if no course identified by courseCode is found
        AppException - if invalid parameters are passed to the constructor of Index

                                    throws AppException
        Returns a list of all indexes belonging to the course identified by courseCode
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        list of indexes
        Throws:
        AppException - if no course identified by courseCode is found

      • getIndex

        public Index getIndex​(int indexNo)
               throws AppException
        Retrieves Index given indexNo
        Parameters:
        indexNo - Index number of the index to retrieve
        Returns:
        Index
        Throws:
        AppException - If no index identified by indexNo is found

      • createLesson

        public void createLesson​(java.lang.String courseCode,
                         int indexNo,
                         LessonType lessonType,
                         Day day,
                         java.lang.String location,
                         java.lang.String groupNo,
                         boolean[] week,
                         int startPeriod,
                         int endPeriod)
                  throws AppException
        Creates a new lesson on the index and course identified by indexNo and courseCode respectively
        Parameters:
        courseCode - Identifier of Course
        indexNo - Identifier of Index
        lessonType - Lesson type of the new lesson
        day - Day that the new Lesson is held on
        location - Location where the Lesson is held
        groupNo - Group number of the lesson eg SEP1
        week - boolean[13] representing whether the lesson is held in that particular week eg week[0] == false signifies that this lesson is not held in week 1
        startPeriod - Start period of the Lesson, from 0-31 where 0 represents 0800 and 31 represents 2330 respectively. Must be smaller than endPeriod (ie the lesson must start before it can end)
        endPeriod - End period of the Lesson, see description in startPeriod. Must be greater than startPeriod.
        Throws:
        AppException - if no course identified by courseCode is found
        AppException - if no index identified by indexNo is found
        AppException - if invalid parameters are passed to the constructor of Lesson

      • registerCourse

        public boolean registerCourse​(Student student,
                              int indexNo)
                       throws AppException
        Register a student for a particular index
        Parameters:
        student - Student to register
        indexNo - Identifier of Index
        Returns:
        true if student was successfully registered, or false if student was placed on the waitlist
        Throws:
        AppException - if no index identified by indexNo is found
        AppException - if student has already been registered for the index identified by indexNo
        AppException - if the index identified by indexNo clashes with other indexes that student is already registered for

      • dropCourse

        public void dropCourse​(Student student,
                       java.lang.String courseCode)
                throws AppException
        Drop a student from a particular course
        Parameters:
        student - Student to drop
        courseCode - Identifier of Course
        Throws:
        AppException - if no course identified by courseCode is found
        AppException - If student is not registered for the course identified by courseCode

      • assertChangeIndex

        public void assertChangeIndex​(java.lang.String courseCode,
                              Student student,
                              int targetIndexNo)
                       throws AppException
        Asserts that student can change index to targetIndexNo
        Parameters:
        courseCode - Identifier of Course
        student - Student to change index
        targetIndexNo - The index number that the student wants to change to
        Throws:
        AppException - if invalid parameters are passed, see Course.assertChangeIndex(Student, int)
        AppException - if changing indexes will result in a timetable clash

      • changeIndex

        public void changeIndex​(java.lang.String courseCode,
                        Student student,
                        int targetIndexNo)
                 throws AppException
        This method changes the student's index from the current index to the targeted index of targetIndexNo
        Parameters:
        courseCode - Identifier of Course
        student - Student to change index
        targetIndexNo - The index number that the student wants to change to
        Throws:
        AppException - if invalid parameters are passed, see assertChangeIndex(String, Student, int)

      • assertSwopIndex

        public void assertSwopIndex​(Student studentA,
                            int indexNoA,
                            Student studentB,
                            int indexNoB)
                     throws AppException
        Asserts whether studentA and studentB can swop index
        Parameters:
        studentA - Student A
        indexNoA - Identifier of Index which Student A would like to swap
        studentB - Student B
        indexNoB - Identifier of Index which Student B would like to swap
        Throws:
        AppException - if invalid parameters are passed in, see Course.assertSwopIndex(Student, int, Student, int)
        AppException - if swopping the index will result in a timetable clash

      • swopIndex

        public void swopIndex​(Student studentA,
                      int indexNoA,
                      Student studentB,
                      int indexNoB)
               throws AppException
        This method allow the student to swop the course index with another student.
        Parameters:
        studentA - Student A
        indexNoA - Identifier of Index which Student A would like to swap
        studentB - Student B
        indexNoB - Identifier of Index which Student B would like to swap
        Throws:
        AppException - if invalid parameters are passed in, see Course.assertSwopIndex(Student, int, Student, int)
